summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from October 30, 2019, discussing the investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's whereabouts. Agents are seeking her addresses, particularly in Rhode Island, and note that a subpoena for her phone tolls has been issued and a Pen Register/Trap and Trace (PRTT) on her phone was activated, showing a location hit in Pawtucket, Rhode Island the previous day.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the FBI's search; agents are trying to locate her addresses and track her phone.

events.title: PRTT Activation and Location Hit
events.description: A Pen Register/Trap and Trace (PRTT) on Ghislaine Maxwell's phone was activated and showed her phone hitting an IP address in Pawtucket, Rhode Island.

events.title: Subpoena Issued for Phone Tolls
events.description: A subpoena was issued for toll records on Ghislaine Maxwell's phone; the FBI is awaiting the results.

keyFacts: On October 29, 2019, a PRTT on Ghislaine Maxwell's phone showed a location hit in Pawtucket, Rhode Island.
A subpoena had been issued for toll records on Maxwell's phone as of October 30, 2019.
The FBI was actively seeking Maxwell's known addresses, particularly in Rhode Island, and had no addresses on file there at the time.
